pages.md:
## Touch Screen Mode

The LCD monitor also functions as a touch screen.

### Shooting Touch Controls

To enable touch controls, select ON for  
**BUTTON/DIAL SETTING > TOUCH SCREEN SETTING > TOUCH SCREEN SETTING**.

!Touch Screen Settings

### EVF

The LCD monitor can be used to select the focus area while pictures are being framed in the electronic viewfinder (EVF). Use  
**BUTTON/DIAL SETTING > TOUCH SCREEN SETTING > EVF TOUCH SCREEN AREA SETTINGS** to choose the area of the monitor employed for touch controls.

!EVF Touch Controls

- When **FACE DETECTION ON** is selected for **AF/MF SETTING > FACE/EYE DETECTION SETTING**, you can choose the face used for focus.
- You can choose the type of subject on which the camera preferentially focuses when **SUBJECT DETECTION ON** is selected for **AF/MF SETTING > SUBJECT DETECTION SETTING**.
